hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Transition
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility falls below 30% (compression) while price consolidates within 5% of 20-day high, a breakout above consolidation high with volume > 1.5x 20-day average will signal transition from NEUTRAL to BULL regime with 70% accuracy over next 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression often precedes explosive moves. Low volatility + consolidation near highs suggests accumulation before breakout. Volume confirmation reduces false breakouts.
entry_conditions: BTC price within 5% of 20-day high for at least 7 days
Daily close above consolidation high with volume > 1.5x 20-day average

exit_conditions.stop_loss: 2% loss from entry or return to volatility compression zone
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 days without regime confirmation (BTC failing to sustain above breakout level)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain >3 days in 40%+ of cases, or post-breakout returns <2% on average over 5 days.
